esbuild-plugin-elm.title: Esbuild plugin for elm
esbuild-plugin-elm.description: Built and maintained an esbuild plugin for building elm projects

cmp-graphql.title: cmp-graphql for neovim
cmp-graphql.description: Built a graphql plugin for schema-based completions for graphql in neovim (nvim-cmp)

elxr.title: Elxr (list expressions)
elxr.description: Built a parser+evaluator for a regex-like syntax for generalizing list operations

typed-regex.title: Typed RegEx
typed-regex.description: Built a typescript library for automatic type inference on regular expressions using named capture groups

algebraic-effects.title: Algebraic Effects
algebraic-effects.description: Built a library for managing side-effects in a pure and composable way using algebraic effects

is-a-dev.title: is-a.dev
is-a-dev.description: Built a free and open source service for developers to register a .is-a.dev subdomain for their personal websites. Currently I lead a team of 5 collaborators to maintain the project

enum-fp.title: EnumFP
enum-fp.description: Built a library for defining functional Enum type / Sum type for javascript with simple pattern matching

shotkey.title: Shotkey
shotkey.description: Hotkey daemon for X11 window managers

bsp-layout.title: bsp-layout
bsp-layout.description: Built a script for managing dynamic layout in bspwm

owyn-launcher.title: OWYN Launcher
owyn-launcher.description: Built a minimalist, text-only launcher written in flutter which I use every day

plasmajs.title: PlasmaJS
plasmajs.description: Built an isomorphic NodeJS framework powered with React for building web apps. It has features like declarative syntax, isomorphic routing, isolated routing for building REST APIs, middlewares, ES2015 syntax with babel

pipey.title: Pipey
pipey.description: Built a library for creating pipeline operator ready functions by converting instance methods's to context-free functions

diary-pwa.title: Diary PWA
diary-pwa.description: Built a progressive web app in go-lang that lets you carry a personalized secure diary in your pocket. Integrated pattern-lock-js library to allow for privacy

pattern-lock-js.title: Pattern Lock
pattern-lock-js.description: Built a library for creating customizable pattern lock for the web and PWAs

h.title: H Kotlin
h.description: Built a simple, easy to use, library for HTML templating in kotlin
